column2: Description
column6: Items

column2: Have a crafting table in your inventory.
column6: Have a Crafting Table

column2: Mine stone with your new pickaxe
column6: Have one of these 3 stones in Cobblestone/Blackstone/Cobbled Deepslate in your inventory.

column2: Construct a better pickaxe
column6: Have a stone pickaxe in your inventory.

column2: Smelt an iron ingot
column6: Have an iron ingot in your inventory.

column2: Protect yourself with a piece of iron armor
column6: Have any type of iron armor in your inventory.

column2: Fill a bucket with lava
column6: Have a lava bucket in your inventory.

column2: Upgrade your pickaxe
column6: Have an iron pickaxe in your inventory.

column2: Block a projectile using your shield.
column6: Block any projectile with a shield.

column2: Obtain a block of obsidian
column6: Have a block of obsidian in your inventory.

column2: Acquire diamonds
column6: Have a diamond in your inventory.

column2: Build; light and enter a Nether Portal
column6: Enter the Nether dimension.

column2: Diamond armor saves lives
column6: Have any type of diamond armor in your inventory.

column2: Enchant an item at an Enchantment Table
column6: Insert an item in an enchanting table; then apply an enchantment.

column2: Weaken and then cure a Zombie Villager
column6: Throw a splash potion of Weakness at a zombie villager; feed it a golden apple; and wait for it to be cured.

column2: Follow an Ender Eye
column6: Enter a stronghold.

column2: Enter the End Portal
column6: Enter the End dimension.

column2: Bring summer clothes
column6: Enter the Nether dimension.

column2: Destroy a Ghast with a fireball
column6: Kill a ghast using a ghast fireball.

column2: Enter a Bastion Remnant
column6: Enter a Bastion Remnant

column2: Obtain Ancient Debris
column6: Have an ancient debris in your inventory.

column2: Use the Nether to travel 7 km in the Overworld
column6: Use the Nether to travel between 2 points in the Overworld with a minimum horizontal distance of 7000 blocks between each other; which is 875 blocks in the Nether.

column2: Break your way into a Nether Fortress
column6: Enter a Nether fortress.

column2: Obtain Crying Obsidian
column6: Have a block of crying obsidian in your inventory.

column2: Distract Piglins with gold
column6: Give a piglin a gold-related item while not wearing any golden armor

column2: Ride a Strider with a Warped Fungus on a Stick
column6: Boost a strider with a warped fungus on a stick.

column2: Rescue a Ghast from the Nether; bring it safely home to the Overworld... and then kill it
column6: Kill a ghast while in the Overworld.

column2: Loot a chest in a Bastion Remnant
column6: Open a naturally generated; never before opened chest in a bastion remnant.

column2: Use a compass on Lodestone
column6: Use a compass on a Lodestone

column2: Get a full suit of Netherite armor
column6: Have a full set of netherite armor in your inventory.

column2: Obtain a Wither Skeleton's skull
column6: Have a wither skeleton skull in your inventory.

column2: Relieve a Blaze of its rod
column6: Have a blaze rod in your inventory.

column2: Charge a Respawn Anchor to the maximum
column6: Charge a Respawn Anchor to the maximum
While riding a strider; travel fifty blocks in lava in the Overworld.

column2: Explore all Nether biomes
column6: basalt_deltas

column2: Summon the Wither
column6: Summon the Wither

column2: Brew a potion
column6: Pick up an item from a brewing stand potion slot. This does not need to be a potion. Water bottles or even glass bottles can also trigger this advancement.

column2: Construct and place a beacon
column6: Be within a 20×20×14 cuboid centered on a beacon block when it realizes it has become powered.

column2: Have all of these 13 status effects applied to the player at the same time
column6: Fire Resistance Invisibility Jump Boost Night Vision Poison Regeneration Resistance Slow Falling Slowness Speed Strength Water Breathing Weakness

column2: Bring a beacon to full power
column6: Be within a 20×20×14 cuboid centered on a beacon block when it realizes it is being powered by a size 4 pyramid.

column2: Have all of these 26 effects applied to the player at the same time
column6: Absorption Bad Omen Blindness Conduit Power Dolphin's Grace Fire Resistance Glowing Haste Hero of the Village Hunger Invisibility Jump Boost Levitation Mining Fatigue Nausea Night Vision Poison Regeneration Resistance Slow Falling Slowness Speed Strength Water Breathing Weakness Wither

column2: Or the beginning?
column6: Enter the End dimension.

column2: Good luck
column6: Kill the ender dragon.

column2: Hold the Dragon Egg
column6: Have a dragon egg in your inventory.

column2: Escape the island
column6: Throw an ender pearl through or walk into an end gateway.

column2: Respawn the Ender Dragon
column6: Be in a certain radius from the exit portal when an ender dragon is summoned using end crystals.

column2: Collect dragon's breath in a glass bottle
column6: Have a bottle of dragon's breath in your inventory.

column1: The City at the End of the Game
column2: Go on in; what could happen?
column6: Enter an end city.

column2: Find elytra
column6: Have a pair of elytra in your inventory.

column2: Levitate up 50 blocks from the attacks of a Shulker
column6: Move a distance of 50 blocks vertically with the Levitation effect applied; regardless of whether it is caused by the effect.

column2: Adventure; exploration; and combat
column6: Kill any entity; or be killed by any entity.

column2: Kill a raid captain.
column6: Kill an entity wearing an ominous banner.

column2: Look at a parrot through a spyglass
column6: Look at a parrot through a spyglass

column2: Kill one of these 34 mobs:
column6: Blaze Cave Spider Creeper Drowned Elder Guardian Ender Dragon Enderman Endermite Evoker Ghast Guardian Hoglin Husk Magma Cube Phantom Piglin Piglin Brute Pillager Ravager Shulker Silverfish Skeleton Slime Spider Stray Vex Vindicator Witch Wither Wither Skeleton Zoglin Zombie Zombie Villager Zombified Piglin

column2: Successfully trade with a Villager
column6: Take an item from a villager or wandering trader's trading output slot; and put it in your inventory.

column2: Jump into a Honey Block to break your fall
column6: Collide on a vertical side of a honey block when in air.

column2: Shoot a crossbow
column6: Shoot a crossbow

column2: Protect a villager from an undesired shock without starting a fire
column6: Be within 30 blocks of a lightning strike that doesn't set any blocks on fire; while an unharmed villager is near
Falls from at least y=319 to at most y=-59 with a vertical distance of greater than 379 blocks.

column2: Sleep in a bed to change your respawn point
column6: Lie down in a bed. The advancement is granted as soon as the player is in the bed; even if the player does not successfully sleep.

column2: Successfully defend a village from a raid
column6: Be in a certain radius from the village center when a raid ends in victory.

column2: Look at a ghast through a spyglass
column6: Look at a ghast through a spyglass

column2: Throw a trident at something.
column6: Hit a mob with a thrown trident.

column2: Shoot something with an arrow
column6: Using a bow or a crossbow; shoot an entity with an arrow; tipped arrow; or spectral arrow.

column2: Kill each of these 34 mobs:
column6: blaze

column2: Use a Totem of Undying to cheat death
column6: Activate a totem of undying by taking fatal damage.

column2: Summon an Iron Golem to help defend a village
column6: Summon an iron golem.

column2: Trade with a villager at the build height limit
column6: Stand on any block that is higher than 318 and trade with Villager or Wandering Trader

column2: Kill two Phantoms with a piercing arrow
column6: Use a crossbow enchanted with Piercing to kill two phantoms.

column2: Give a Pillager a taste of their own medicine
column6: Kill a pillager with a crossbow.

column2: Kill five unique mobs with one crossbow shot
column6: Note: This is a hidden advancement; meaning that it can be viewed by the player only after completing it.

column2: Discover every biome
column6: bamboo_jungle

column2: Make the Meadows come alive with the sound of music from a jukebox
column6: While in a meadow biome; place down a jukebox and use a music disc on it.

column2: Walk on powder snow...without sinking in it
column6: Walk on powder snow while wearing leather boots.

column2: Look at the Ender Dragon through a spyglass
column6: Look at the Ender Dragon through a spyglass

column2: Strike a Villager with lightning
column6: Hit a villager with lightning created by a trident with the Channeling enchantment.

column2: Kill a Skeleton from at least 50 meters away
column6: Be at least 50 blocks away horizontally when a skeleton is killed by an arrow after the player has attacked it once.

column2: Hit the bullseye of a Target block from at least 30 meters away
column6: Be at least 30 blocks away when the center of a target is shot with a projectile horizontally by the player.

column2: The world is full of friends and food
column6: Consume anything that can be consumed.

column2: Use a Campfire to collect Honey from a Beehive using a Bottle without aggravating the bees
column6: Use a glass bottle on a beehive or bee nest while not angering the bees inside.

column2: Breed a pair of any of these 22 mobs:
column6: Axolotl; Bee; Cat; Chicken; Cow; Donkey; Fox; Goat; Hoglin; Horse; Llama; Mooshroom; Mule; Ocelot; Panda; Pig; Rabbit; Sheep; Strider; Trader Llama; Turtle; Wolf

column2: Get in a Boat and float with a Goat
column6: Enter a boat with a goat.

column2: Tame an animal
column6: Cat; Donkey; Horse; Llama; Mule; Parrot; Trader Llama; Wolf

column2: Make the text of a sign glow
column6: Use a glow ink sac on a sign.

column2: Catch a fish
column6: Cod; Salmon; Tropical Fish; Pufferfish

column2: Move a Bee Nest; with 3 bees inside; using Silk Touch
column6: Move a Bee Nest; with 3 bees inside; using Silk Touch

column2: Plant a seed and watch it grow
column6: Beetroot; Melon; Nether Wart; Pumpkin; Wheat

column2: Apply Honeycomb to a Copper block!
column6: Use a honeycomb on a copper block.

column2: Breed all the animals!
column6: axolotl

column2: Tame all cat variants!
column6: tabby

column2: Catch a fish... without a fishing rod!
column6: Use a water bucket on any fish mob.

column2: Eat everything that is edible; even if it's not good for you
column6: apple

column2: Use a Netherite ingot to upgrade a hoe; and then reevaluate your life choices
column6: Have a netherite hoe in your inventory.

column2: Scrape Wax off of a Copper block!
column6: Use an axe to revert a waxed copper block.

column2: Catch an axolotl in a bucket
column6: Use a water bucket on an axolotl.

column2: Team up with an axolotl and win a fight
column6: Have the Regeneration effect applied from assisting an axolotl or it killing a mob.
